summary: Elven Sword, Y U No Match The Set?
descriptionHtml:
====================================
CORRECTIVE ELVEN SWORD COLORS
====================================
Author: MadCat221 (MadCat221@gmail.com)

Version: 1.0

January 31, 2012

1. Introduction
2. Version History


===============
1. INTRODUCTION
===============

I could not help but notice that the Elven Sword kinda sticks out in the Elven lineup: Its blade edges are the same brassey material as the rest of the weapon, while the same portions on all others are instead some warm gray metal.

This mod is a quick retexture and cleanup (the sword is also a fair bit grungier than other elven weapons) so that it\'s more in-line with the rest of the Elven set.

==================
2. VERSION HISTORY
==================

v1: 
Initial Release.
author: MadCat221
